page.title: 06VILLAGE STORE - TILMANSTONE
page.content:
The{village store}is an institution which provides a valuable service for young and older people who, due to age or with young children, find a trip to one of the nearer towns difficult.
The proprietress of the store is also the{Post Mistress,}while her husband, who follows his own line of work, assists in serving and delivery. The shop window provides{advertising space to individuals,{village organ_ {isations}and for{public notices. { { Foods}(fresh and packet);{cleaning, {toiletries}and{household requirements can be bought.{Vegetables, fruit}and{ {whole foods}are also available.{ { Prices}tend to be a little higher than in a town. Oven_baked{bread}is delivered three days a week from a baker in Eastry.
